document_data.name: ''Northhelm''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Northhelm''''' was a [[magic]]al [[helmet]] that made the wearer resistant to cold and provided them with protection.
document_data.Description: This helm had a ''+2'' enchantment. Wearing the helmet made one take less damage from cold-based attacks.
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], the magical helmet was owned by the [[Northlanders]] of the village known as [[Icewolf]].
